channel.title: Help making npc's walk it dosent work no matter what i try ¬
channel.description: please help im new to this i cant seem to make my npc walk i can add him and make him talk and drop stuff (but not walk please help ) thnk you please asap !¬!!!¬!

item.title: Help making npc's walk it dosent work no matter what i try ¬
item.dc:creator: @billynom8s billynom8s
item.description:
@billynom8s wrote:

no i have this //------NpcID—CoordX–CoordY–Height–RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption
spawn = 1767 2658 3333 0 2656 3336 2660 3333 1 Lumbridge Cow

im useing the newst version of morphscape[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 21, 2007, 01:17:58 PM[/size][hr]of course this my new code i deleted all the rest but i dont understand how to make them move they always just stand there

please help

item.title: Help making npc's walk it dosent work no matter what i try ¬
item.dc:creator: @SSG_Fan_XX SSG Fan XX
item.description:
@SSG_Fan_XX wrote:

If you have a autospawn you would see something like this

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-HP-Descrption spawn = 521 2595 3105 0 0 0 0 0 0 Armor Shop
Change it to this

spawn = (NPCID)		(X)	(Y)	0	0	0	0	1	0	Name of whatever

basicly

Read full topic
